data.persona: I am but a peasant.  The king looks down on us.  I barely eat.  I wish I had a job.
data.description:
You are in the Horse field.
The horse field includes a huge plains for horses to ride. The fields are yellow and green. The place smells of musk and horse.
There's a horse, a grass, and a pitchfork here.
The knight is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shirt.

data.short_motivation: i want to steal the horse from the horse field
data.mid_motivation: I want to sell the horse for money
data.long_motivation: I want to have enough money to live comfortably or to move to another place
